Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Hangover' (2009), which of the following statements about the characters and their relationships are true?
Options:
A. Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, and Bradley Cooper were casual acquaintances before filming.
B. The chemistry among the characters was established due to their prior relationships.
C. All characters in the movie were strangers before the filming began.
D. The rapport among the main actors contributed to the film's success.
Correct Answer: Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, and Bradley Cooper were casual acquaintances before filming.; The chemistry among the characters was established due to their prior relationships.; The rapport among the main actors contributed to the film's success.
